title: Diary of Steve the Noob 27 (An Unofficial Minecraft Book)
description: 17,200 words with 27 pictures. Here it is! Sorry for the delay. Oh, no! Steve and his friends are surrounded by Team Scorpion! Find out what happens next! This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book.
